thread.title: BRIEF-BioMarin Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.30

title: BRIEF-BioMarin Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.30
text: 17 PM / Updated 5 minutes ago BRIEF-BioMarin Q4 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.30 Reuters Staff Feb 22 (Reuters) - BioMarin Pharmaceutical Inc: * BIOMARIN ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.30 * QTRLY TOTAL REVENUES $358.3 MILLION VERSUS $300.1 MILLION * SEES 2018 TOTAL REVENUES $1,470 MILLION TO $1,530 MILLION * SEES 2018 GAAP NET LOSS OF $115 MILLION TO $165 MILLION * SEES 2018 NON-GAAP INCOME OF $100 MILLION TO $140 MILLION * Q4 REVENUE VIEW $351.6 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $1.48 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
